why_us.title: Ticketing technology
why_us.desc: A blockchain ticketing platform that connects users and event organizers in a secure and transparent way. Providing trust, transparency and accountability issue between users

why_us.title: No fraud, scam, or clone ticket
why_us.desc: Impossible to forge or duplicate a ticket without leaving a trace due to all transactions are recorded on a public ledger

why_us.title: QR Code As Proof
why_us.desc: We use a QR code as proof so event organizer can get accurate data on the number of event attendees

why_us.title: Digital Collectibles Ticket
why_us.desc: People love to collect things, You can buy them, sell them, trade them, and build a community around them. You could even make a game out of it.

why_us.title: Royalty increase business profit
why_us.desc: Business provider get royalty from NFT ticket selling that enables to increase profitable

why_us.title: Focusing on NEAR Community
why_us.desc: We are focusing on NEAR community when they create events, EOs and  business owners whose products are subscriptions
